rules_text:
Foreshadow {2}{R} [i](You may cast this spell for its foreshadow cost. If you do, also trigger its “dies” ability when it enters.)[/i]
When Affluent Host dies, it deals 1 damage to each opponent. Create a Treasure token. [i](It's an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.”)[/i]
